title: Realme's 10,000mAh phone could launch this month
description: Last year, Realme confirmed plans to launch a smartphone featuring a 10,000mAh battery. Meanwhile, last month, a device bearing the model number RMX5107 surfaced online with a 10,001mAh cell. The same model has now been spotted on the BIS website. As per a tipster, the upcoming Realme phone would be part of the P series and could launch later this month. The phone is expected to debut in India since it was listed on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) site. Realme has yet to release a smartphone with an 8,000mAh or larger battery. It recently unveiled the Realme P4x in India with a...

title: Xiaomi 17 Max is coming with the biggest battery in the lineup
description: Xiaomi's flagship 17 series is due to get a new member soon, according to a new leak from China. This will be the Xiaomi 17 Max, which will feature the biggest battery of any Xiaomi 17 device at 8,000 mAh. The battery will support 100W wired and 50W wireless charging. The Xiaomi 17 Max is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, and has a screen with extremely narrow symmetrical bezels. Its camera island design will allegedly be very similar to that of the 'vanilla' Xiaomi 17. Xiaomi 17 Speaking of cameras, it will have the same main camera as the Xiaomi 17, but will add a...

title: Google Pixel 10a release timeline leaks along with colors and storage options
description: If you've been patiently waiting for the Google Pixel 10a to hit the streets, you're in luck as apparently you only have around one month left to wait. That is, of course, if the latest rumor pans out. The phone will allegedly be in stores around mid-February. It will be offered in four colorways: Obsidian, Berry, Fog, and Lavender, with 128GB and 256GB of storage. According to a past leak, the Pixel 10a has a 6.28-inch AMOLED screen with FHD+ resolution and 120Hz refresh rate, a 48MP main camera, a 13MP ultrawide, a 13MP selfie camera, 8GB of RAM, and a 5,100 mAh battery. If...

title: Motorola Moto G Power (2026) in for review
description: We've got Motorola's 2026 Moto G trifecta in the office and will do a review on all three, starting with the Moto G Power (2026). It's the nicest among the three with a FullHD IPS LCD, 8GB of RAM, wireless charging, and full water and dust resistance. The Moto G Power (2026) on the left, Moto G (2026) in the middle, and the Moto G Play (2026) on the right In fact, the Moto G Power (2026) takes durability a whole step further with MIL-STD-810H compliance for drop resistance, extreme temperatures, humidity, and 11 others. You have a choice of Pantone Evening Blue and Pure...

title: Apple introduces Creator Studio, a subscription bundle of its best creative apps
description: Today Apple is introducing a new app bundle. It's called Creator Studio and for a fixed monthly or yearly fee, you get access to a bunch of creative apps: Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Macs and iPads, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Macs. There are also intelligent features and premium content in Keynote, Pages, Numbers, and, coming later, Freeform on iPhones, iPads, and Macs. And all of this for $12.99 per month or $129 per year, with a free one-month trial. For college students and educators, the price is $2.99 per month or $29.99 per year. The Creator...

title: Insta360 launches upgraded Link 2 Pro and Link 2C Pro webcams with huge 1/1.3" sensors
description: A little over a year ago, Insta360 unveiled the Link 2 and 2C web cameras. Now the company is introducing “Pro” models for each, which pack larger 1/1.3” sensors – that’s a massive upgrade over the 1/2” sensors of the non-Pro models. Insta360 Link 2 Pro (left) and Link 2C Pro (right) Here’s a quick introduction. The Insta360 Link 2 Pro uses a gimbal that can track you as you move around the room. The camera can optionally be paired with the Wave Speakerphone for conference calls. The camera has an 84° lens (f/1.9) and you can use the Insta360 app to define a Tracking Area – this...

title: Here's when the Redmi Note 15 series is finally launching in Europe
description: The Redmi Note 15 series got its global launch around a month ago, but the phones are yet to land in Europe. That seems likely to change very soon, though. According to Xiaomi's website, the European launch is scheduled for January 15, which is the day after tomorrow. In some markets you can grab a small discount for the devices on that website (€20 or £15), which will be available to use on a purchase made between January 15 and January 31. While we wait, you can read our review of the Redmi Note 15 Pro+ here and the Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G here. We're also working on full reviews of...

title: Oppo A6 and A6 5G introduced
description: The Oppo A6 series continues to expand in numbers and the A6 and A6 5G are the latest entries. The pair features nearly identical specs apart from their chipsets, with the A6 packing the Snapdragon 685 chip while the A6 5G gets the Dimensity 6300. Oppo A6 (left) and A6 5G (right) Both feature huge 7,000mAh batteries with 45W wired charging and reverse wired charging capabilities. They are IP66/IP68/IP69 water and dust proof and boot ColorOS 15 based on Android 15. Up front, you are greeted with a 6.75-inch IPS LCD with HD+ resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate. The panel is...

title: Samsung Galaxy S27 Ultra camera details tipped
description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra hasn’t even launched yet, but details about its successor, the Galaxy S27 Ultra, are already emerging. The latest leak reveals new information on its camera setup. According to well-known tipster Ice Universe, the Galaxy S27 Ultra will be equipped with an improved main rear camera sensor, likely called the ISOCELL S5KHP6. Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra leaked render. However, the new sensor will still be the same size as the current ISOCELL HP2 used on the Galaxy S25 Ultra and older Ultra models. The 200MP HP2 sensor has a size of 1/1.3-inch with an f/1.7...

title: Redmi Turbo 5 Pro runs Geekbench with yet to be announced MediaTek chipset
description: The Redmi Turbo 5 Pro just passed through Geekbench, which may shed some light on the upcoming chipsets from MediaTek. The phone’s model number, 2602BRT18C, matches the one that we saw in a 3C certification from a couple of weeks ago. That same phone will reportedly use the Dimensity 9500e chipset. Here’s what Geekbench has to say about it. The motherboard is listed as “dash”. The CPU has eight cores split as such: 1x 3.73GHz + 3x 3.30GHz + 4x 2.40GHz. The GPU is an Immortalis-G925 MC12 clocked at 339MHz (boosting to 622MHz). Redmi Turbo 5 Pro (2602BRT18C) Geekbench...

title: Honor Magic8 Pro Air camera specs emerge
description: The upcoming Honor Magic8 Pro Air is set to be unveiled on January 19, and the teaser campaign for the slim and light device is in full effect. The latest addition gives us detailed camera specs. Honor Magic8 Pro Air camera teasers Honor revealed that its upcoming flagship will feature a 50MP main cam armed with a 1/1.3” sensor. It will be paired with a 64MP periscope telephoto lens. Tipster UniverseIce chimed in with more details, claiming the main cam will feature an f/1.6 aperture and 23mm equivalent focal length. The periscope telephoto will apparently get an f/2.6 aperture...

title: Oppo Reno15, Reno15 Pro, and Reno15 Pro Mini go on sale in India
description: The Oppo Reno15 series, announced for India last week, is now available for purchase in the country through Oppo India's official website, Amazon.in, Flipkart, and mainline retail outlets. The lineup includes the Reno15, Reno15 Pro, Reno15 Pro Mini, and Reno15c. The Reno15c will be available in India next month. The Oppo Reno15 comes in Glacier White, Twilight Blue, and Aurora Blue colors with three memory options - 8GB/256GB, 12GB/256GB, and 12GB/512GB, priced at INR45,999, INR48,999, and INR53,999, respectively. Oppo Reno15 The Oppo Reno15 Pro Mini is available in...

title: Samsung Exynos 2700 chipset details leak
description: Samsung unveiled the Exynos 2600 SoC just a month ago as the world’s first 2nm mobile chip. While the chipset hasn’t appeared in any phones yet, a new leak has already surfaced revealing details about its successor, the Exynos 2700. A tipster with virtually no track record has shared alleged details about Samsung’s Exynos 2700 SoC, expected to debut in 2027. As always, such claims should be taken with a grain of salt. The tipster claims the chipset, codenamed Ulysses, will be built on Samsung’s second-generation 2nm process (SF2P). It is said to deliver a 12% boost in overall...

title: Realme Neo8 launch date has been revealed
description: Realme has finally set a launch date for the Neo8. The company has also recently revealed that the Neo8 will be equipped with a Samsung M14 OLED display with up to 6,500 nits peak brightness and a 165Hz refresh rate. The Realme Neo8 is set to debut in China on January 22. It will be equipped with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset and feature a triple rear camera setup. Recent leaks have revealed that the phone could get a 6.78-inch display, a 16MP front camera, and an ultrasonic fingerprint scanner. The rear camera setup is said to include a 50MP main sensor, another 50MP periscope...

title: Another Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra case showcases its design
description: We've already seen the upcoming Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra in a bunch of cases, and today there's another one - already up and listed on its maker's website. Like the others, this showcases the phone's oft-leaked design, basically confirming, yet again, the shape of the camera island - and the fact that there's one oval island housing three of the cameras, vertically aligned. Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra in a case We also get another confirmation of the S26 Ultra's more rounded corners - this will, in fact, be the most curved-corner Ultra ever, believe it or not. And for the first...

title: More details about the OnePlus 15T surface online
description: The OnePlus 13T launched last April and now the company is rumored to be working on its successor, the 15T. Today more details about it have been leaked courtesy of Digital Chat Station on Weibo. According to him, the phone weighs 194g and will be offered in Relaxing Matcha, Healing White Chocolate, and Pure Cocoa (all names are machine translated from Chinese, keep in mind), in the following five RAM/storage combos: 12/256GB, 12/512GB, 16/256GB, 16/512GB, 16GB/1TB. It's powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, and comes with a smaller screen (like its predecessor) with...

title: Samsung now offers Certified Re-Newed Galaxy S25 series phones in the UK, Germany and France
description: Back in August, Samsung added the Galaxy S25 series to its Certified Re-Newed (CRN) program for the US market. Now, the company is extending this to three European markets: the UK, Germany and France. In the UK and Germany, the program is called “Certified Re-Newed”, while in France it is “Refurbished Premium By Samsung” (or “Reconditionné Premium par Samsung”). Either way, you get the same thing. You can use these links for a quick look. Note that availability varies per unit – some storage options aren’t available at the moment. Also, as far as we can tell, the Edge and FE are not...

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip8's cameras get detailed
description: Samsung's upcoming Galaxy Z Flip8 has already been rumored to be thinner and lighter than its predecessor, and it will be powered by the Exynos 2600 chipset. Now we have the first details about its cameras, and you'll be disappointed if you expected any changes. That's right, according to a new rumor, the Galaxy Z Flip8 will have a 50MP main camera, a 12MP ultrawide, and a 10MP selfie camera. Those are the same resolutions that the Flip7 has. Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 There's a chance that Samsung might upgrade one or more camera sensors, sticking with the same resolution, but let's...

title: Oppo A6s 5G and A6s 4G are now official
description: Oppo has made the A6s 5G and A6s 4G official. The A6s 5G comes with a 6.75-inch 720x1570 LCD screen with 1,125-nit peak brightness, 120Hz refresh rate, and 240Hz touch sampling rate, the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC at the helm, and a 7,000 mAh battery with support for 80W wired charging (a full charge takes 64 minutes). On the rear there's a 50MP main camera and a 2MP monochrome sensor, and for selfies you get a 16MP shooter. The A6s 5G comes in three options with LPDDR4X RAM and UFS 2.2 storage: 6/128GB, 8/128GB, and 8/256GB. It measures 166.61 x 78.51 x 8.61mm and weighs 216g. It's...

title: Smartphone makers may soon be required to share source code with India's government
description: The Indian government is proposing a long list of new security requirements aimed at smartphone makers, which includes source code review in order to address potential vulnerabilities. The measure is part of a broader list of 83 requirement proposals by government officials. As per two Reuters News reports, every smartphone manufacturer selling devices in India will have to provide access to their proprietary source code for review to designated government labs. The aim is to identify OS-level vulnerabilities, which could be exploited by hackers. The backlash to the proposed measures is...
